title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • Coordinates for location of local minimum with label, and no others

  • Coordinates for location of local maximum with label, and no others

  • Coordinates for the location of the local minimum and coordinates for the location of the local maximum, and no others, without labels
